mapper.select: SELECT PI.check_code AS checkCode ,B.branch_name AS branchName ,C.customer_name AS customerName ,DC.goods_code AS goodsCode ,PI.product_status AS productStatus ,S.staff_name AS staffName ,PI.check_date AS checkDate FROM periodic_inspection AS PI JOIN doc_contract AS DC ON PI.contract_code = DC.contract_code JOIN branch AS B ON PI.branch_code = B.branch_code JOIN customer AS C ON DC.customer_id = C.customer_id JOIN staff AS S ON PI.staff_id = S.staff_code;
